scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.setup: npm init -y && npm install --save-dev webpack webpack-cli && npm install --save-dev html-webpack-plugin && npm install --save-dev style-loader css-loader && npm install --save-dev html-loader && npm install --save-dev webpack-dev-server && npm install css-minimizer-webpack-plugin --save-dev && npm install --save-dev mini-css-extract-plugin
